titles.title: A bill to extend the suspension of duty on 1,1,2,2,3,3,4,4,4-Nonafluorobutanesulfonic acid.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the suspension of duty on 1,1,2,2,3,3,4,4,4-Nonafluorobutanesulfonic acid, potassium salt.
